reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress chic and flattering, with soft, stretchy material that fits well and is true to size.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute, Comfortable, and Perfect Coverage!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I am 5’5” and 143lbs. I ordered a medium in khaki. I was really worried the color would look terrible because khaki, cream, and white are usually colors I avoid since they don’t always help with a slimming look and I have a little more curve after having a baby. But this was absolutely gorgeous. I get so many compliments when I wear it! It is warm, comfortable, and soft sweater material, and the khaki color is soooo cute! This will be perfect for fall. I usually wear medium, and this was true to size, not too tight, it’s very stretchy, and still has plenty of space. It also has enough shoulder coverage for the new garments in case anyone out there is LDS ;) Read more
items.author: Kristi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic Dress!
items.body: Buy this dress! It is so pretty, classy, and soft. Fits my curves gently and looks elegant, not "bodicon" tight. I bought the dark brown with alternating black stripes and received many compliments. I am 5’5" and 125 lbs.and the small is perfect.the I wear it with a little black shrug when warm enough and with the black velvet Amazon jacket when cooler. A ready to wear dress for any event casual or dressy. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleeveless Knit maxi- small
items.body: Lovely, Simple, elegant. Nice material. A little pricey, but hangs nicely on the body. Hopefully it will stand up to washings Well. I typically wear a small and a small fit fine Read more
items.author: AutumnBerry

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to closet!
items.body: Love this dress! Although, there were some loose strings when I washed it, the material is not terrible. It is a very classy dress. Read more
items.author: Wellness & Wardrobe by Lili

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty outfit that’s absolutely worth buying
items.body: Great value for the price comfortable and true to size. Material is perfect for warm days, not see through. Read more
items.author: Debra Mills

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as fitted as shown.
items.body: It isn't as form fitting as I thought it would be. The mid section definitly hangs off of your body. The sizing is also correct so its juat how its made i guess, very stretchy though so it would be great if pregnant! Read more
items.author: MD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars my favorite
items.body: LOVE! super soft and comfortable. hugs figure nicely, not super tight Read more
items.author: Lily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty!
items.body: You can dress up with heels especially booties and a nice blazer or dress it down with loafers! Perfect for this weather due to the stretchy wool fabric. Mine is the chocolate with thin black stripes. Love it! Read more
items.author: Rosa L.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Pure Black, Khaki, White, Creamy-white, Blue, Royal Blue, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
